campaignevents-desc: Yana ba da fasali don masu shirya yaƙin neman zaɓe da mahalarta.

right-campaignevents-view-private-partic: Duba mahalarta taron masu zaman kansu

campaignevents-error-invalid-title: Taken shafin taron ba shi da inganci: $1 .
campaignevents-error-invalid-title-inter: Ƙayyade shafi na taron akan wiki na gida.
campaignevents-error-page-not-found: Babu shafi na taron da wannan sunan.
campaignevents-error-page-namespace-not-: Dole ne shafin taron ya kasance a cikin ɗayan wuraren da aka halatta
campaignevents-error-page-with-section: Dole ne shafin taron bai ƙunshi sunan sashe ba.
campaignevents-error-too-many-wikis: Shigar da iyakar {{PLURAL:$1| daya wiki| $1 wiki}}.
campaignevents-error-invalid-wikis: Ba a gane ID na wiki masu zuwa: $1 .
campaignevents-error-too-many-topics: Shigar da iyakar {{PLURAL:$1| daya wiki| $1 wiki}}.
campaignevents-error-invalid-topics: Ba a gane ID na wiki masu zuwa: $1 .
campaignevents-error-invalid-chat-url: Shigar da ingantaccen URL ɗin tattaunawa.
campaignevents-error-trackingtool-withou: Samar da mai gano abin da ya faru a kan kayan aikin bin diddigin da aka bayar.
campaignevents-error-trackingtool-eventi: Samar da mai gano kayan aikin sa ido
campaignevents-error-invalid-trackingtoo: Samar da ingantaccen kayan aikin ganowa
campaignevents-error-invalid-status: Nuna ko taron yana buɗewa ko a rufe.
campaignevents-error-invalid-timezone: Shigar da yankin lokaci mai inganci.
campaignevents-error-invalid-start: Lokacin farawa na taron ba shi da inganci.
campaignevents-error-start-past: Shigar da lokacin farawa a nan gaba.
campaignevents-error-invalid-end: Lokacin ƙarshen taron ba shi da inganci.
campaignevents-error-start-after-end: Shigar da kwanan wata na ƙarshe wanda ya zo bayan ranar farawa.
campaignevents-error-invalid-dashboard-u: Dashboard URL ɗin da aka bayar baya cikin ingantaccen tsari. URL ɗin yakamata ya kasance cikin wannan tsari: $1 /[Sunan Cibiyar]/[Taken Shirin]. Misali: $1 /Example_Organization/Example_Event_Title.
campaignevents-error-no-meeting-type: Zaɓi aƙalla nau'in taron taron guda ɗaya.
campaignevents-error-invalid-meeting-url: Shigar da ingantaccen URL taron taron.
campaignevents-error-meeting-url-not-onl: Ba dole ba ne a bayyana URL ɗin taron idan ba a kan layi ba ne.
campaignevents-error-countryoraddress-no: Ba dole ba ne a bayyana ƙasar taron da adireshin idan ba a cikin mutum ba ne.
campaignevents-error-invalid-question-na: Ba a gane waɗannan tambayoyin ba: $1
campaignevents-error-move-eventpage-name: Ba a ba da izinin yin rajistar taron a wannan sararin samaniya ba.
campaignevents-edit-form-details-subtitl: Bayar da cikakken bayani game da taron da kuke shiryawa
campaignevents-edit-field-page-help: Shafin taron ya ƙunshi bayani game da taron ku. Mutane na iya yin rijista azaman mahalarta a shafin taron.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-hel: Kara sunan mai amfani na wasu masu shirya don ba su izinin gudanar da wannan taron.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-cre: Wannan shi ne mahaliccin taron, sauran masu shiryawa ba za su iya cire wannan mai amfani ba.
campaignevents-edit-field-organizers-use: Wannan {{GENDER:$1| mai amfani}} ba a yarda ya tsara abubuwan da suka faru ba.
campaignevents-edit-field-wiki-type: Shin wannan taron yana mai da hankali kan takamaiman wikis?
campaignevents-edit-field-wikis-help: Idan taron ku yana faruwa a kan takamaiman wikis, da fatan za a lissafa su a nan. Wannan yana taimaka wa mutane su yanke shawara game da abubuwan da za su halarta, kuma yana taimakawa tare da nazari.
campaignevents-edit-field-tracking-tools: Za a aika sunayen masu amfani na mahalarta masu rijista ta jama'a ta atomatik zuwa Dashboard. Wannan kayan aikin yana taimaka muku saka idanu kan gudummawar mahalarta da auna tasirin taron kamfen ɗin ku. [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Koyi ƙarin].
Shigar da Shirye-shirye & Abubuwan Dashboard URL don taron ku
campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url-help: Idan kuna da ƙungiyar taɗi ta kan layi don mahalarta wannan taron, zaku iya ƙara hanyar haɗin gayyata anan. Mahalarta za su iya duba hanyar haɗin gayyata bayan yin rajista.
campaignevents-edit-field-event-is-test: Shin wannan lamari ne kai tsaye ko gwaji?
campaignevents-edit-field-topics-help: Kuna iya ƙara iyakar {{PLURAL:$1| batu guda| $1 batutuwa}}.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-intro: Zaɓi kowane ɗayan tambayoyin da ke ƙasa don mahalarta su amsa yayin yin rajista don taron.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-expla: A yayin taron, zaku iya samun damar martanin mahalarta ɗaya ɗaya don tambayoyin da basu haɗa da Bayanin Gane Kai ba (PII). Bayan taron ya ƙare, za a sami amsoshin duk tambayoyin (a cikin jimillar nau'i kawai) kuma za a share martanin mutum ɗaya.
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-non-p: Tambayoyin da ba na sirri ba (wadanda ba PII ba)
campaignevents-edit-form-questions-pii-n: Don duba haɗakar martanin mahalarta waɗanda ke ɗauke da bayanan sirri, za a umarce ku don sarrafa bayanan ɗan takara, gami da bayanan da za a iya tantance ɗan takara, waɗanda aka tattara yayin rajistar taron tare da kulawa.
campaignevents-edit-form-notice: Za a tattara sunayen masu amfani kawai daga mahalarta yayin rajista. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CampaignEvents/Registration Koyi ƙarin].
campaignevents-edit-invalid-id: Samar da ingantaccen ID na taron.
campaignevents-edit-no-event-id: Wannan shafin bashi da ingantaccen ID na taron. Shigar da ingantaccen ID na taron ko duba duk abubuwan da ke faruwa a cikin [[Special:AllEvents|Jerin haɗin gwiwa]]
campaignevents-edit-event-notfound: Babu wani abu da ya faru tare da wannan ID ɗin.
campaignevents-edit-page-nonlocal: Da fatan za a kammala ''[ $1 ku kammala rajistar taron ku akan $2 ] ''', wiki inda aka ƙirƙiri taron.
campaignevents-edit-need-central-account: Kuna buƙatar asusun mai amfani na tsakiya don kunna ko gyara rajistar taron.
campaignevents-edit-organizers-not-allow: $2 {{PLURAL:$1| baya |bashi}} da ake buƙata izini don zama {{PLURAL:$1| mai shiryawa | masu shiryawa}}.
campaignevents-edit-no-organizers: Abubuwan da suka faru dole ne su sami akalla mai tsarawa ɗaya. Don Allah ka ƙara mai shiryawa ko ka goge taron idan ba a buƙata ba.
campaignevents-edit-removed-creator: Ba za ku iya cire $1 ba saboda wannan {{GENDER:$1| mai amfani}} shine mahaliccin taron
campaignevents-edit-no-creator: Dole ne ku ƙara kanku a matsayin mai shiryawa lokacin da kuka fara ba da damar yin rajistar taron.
campaignevents-edit-too-many-organizers: Ba za ku iya ƙara fiye da $1 {{PLURAL:$1| mai shiryawa | masu shiryawa}}.
campaignevents-edit-organizer-need-centr: Mai zuwa {{PLURAL:$1|mai amfani}} {{PLURAL:$1| mai shirya|masu shiryawa}}: $2.
campaignevents-edit-invalid-username: " $1 " ba ingantaccen sunan mai amfani ba ne.
campaignevents-error-page-already-regist: Shafin taron da aka bayar ya riga ya sami rajistar da ke da alaƙa.
Ba za ka iya kammala aikin ba saboda an goge rajistar taron daga wannan shafin taron.
campaignevents-edit-not-allowed-registra: Ba a ba ka izinin gyara wannan rajistar taron ba.
campaignevents-enable-registration-not-a: Ba a ba ku izinin yin rajista na taron don shafin da aka ba ku ba.
campaignevents-register-error-no-event-i: Wannan shafin ba shi da ingantaccen ID na taron. Shigar da ingantaccen ID na taron ko duba duk abubuwan da ke cikin jerin haɗin gwiwa.
campaignevents-register-error-event-not-: Babu wani abu da ya faru tare da wannan ID ɗin.
campaignevents-register-success: Yanzu kun yi rajista don wannan taron.
campaignevents-unregister-confirmation-t: Tabbatar da cewa kana so ka soke rajistar ka don wannan taron ta amfani da maɓallin "{{int:campaignevents-unregister-confirmation-btn}}".
campaignevents-delete-not-allowed-regist: Ba a ba ku damar share wannan rajistar taron ba.
campaignevents-register-not-allowed: Ba a ba ku damar yin rajista don abubuwan da suka faru ba.
campaignevents-register-event-past: Wannan lokacin rajistar taron ya riga ya ƙare.
campaignevents-register-need-central-acc: Kuna buƙatar asusun mai amfani na tsakiya don yin rajista don abubuwan da suka faru.
campaignevents-register-answers-aggregat: Ba za ka iya ba da amsoshi ba saboda waɗanda ka riga ka bayar an haɗa su kuma an goge su.
campaignevents-unregister-not-allowed: Ba a ba ku damar soke rajistar ku ba.
campaignevents-unregister-not-participan: Ba ku da rajista don wannan taron.
campaignevents-unregister-need-central-a: Kuna buƙatar asusun mai amfani na tsakiya don soke rajistar taron ku.
campaignevents-myevents-need-central-acc: Kuna buƙatar asusun mai amfani na tsakiya don ganin jerin abubuwan da kuka faru.

campaignevents-allevents-label-events-pe: Abubuwan da suka faru a kowane shafi

campaignevents-eventslist-delete-dialog-: Za ku rasa duk bayanan rajista, amma ba za a share shafin taron ba.

campaignevents-delete-error-event-not-fo: Babu wani abu da ya faru tare da wannan ID ɗin.
campaignevents-delete-error-already-dele: An riga an goge wannan rajistar taron.
campaignevents-delete-confirmation-text: Tabbatar cewa kuna son share wannan rajistar taron ta amfani da maɓallin "{{int:campaignevents-delete-submit-btn}}". Ba za a iya mayar da wannan aikin ba.
campaignevents-register-registration-del: Ba za ka iya yin rajista don wannan taron ba saboda an goge shi.
campaignevents-unregister-registration-d: Ba za ka iya soke rajistar taron ka ba saboda an goge shi.

campaignevents-eventpage-unregister-conf: Shin kun tabbata kuna son soke rajistar ku?
campaignevents-eventpage-registration-en: An ba da damar yin rajista. Mahalarta yanzu za su iya yin rajista a shafin taron ku.

campaignevents-eventpage-enableheader-ev: Shafin taron : Kunna rajista don mahalarta su iya yin rijista don taron ku kai tsaye a shafin.
campaignevents-eventpage-enable-registra: Ba da damar yin rijistar taron
Wannan yana bawa mahalarta damar yin rajista don halartar taron ku kai tsaye akan wannan shafin.
campaignevents-back-to-your-events: Koma zuwa abubuwan da suka faru
campaignevents-event-details-header-ques: Martanin mahalarta guda ɗaya da aka nuna akan tebur za a haɗa su sannan a share su, ko dai kwanaki 90 bayan ƙaddamarwa ko kuma a ƙarshen taron (duk wanda ya fara zuwa). campaignevents-event-details-not-found: Babu wani abu da ya faru tare da wannan ID ɗin.

campaignevents-unregister-participants-r: Ba za ku iya cire mahalarta daga wannan taron ba saboda an goge shi.

campaignevents-event-details-organizers-: Kuna buƙatar kunna JavaScript don ganin cikakken jerin masu shiryawa.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-http-error: Wani kuskure da ba a sani ba ya faru yayin ƙoƙarin aiwatar da kayan aikin sa ido.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-con: Ba za a iya haɗa shi da $1 ba saboda batun daidaita shafin
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-not: Babu wani daga cikin wanda ya shirya wannan taron da ke gudanar da kwas na $1 .
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-alr: Darasin $1 ya riga yana da mahalarta, sabili da haka ba za a iya haɗa shi da wannan taron ba.
An riga an haɗa kwas ɗin $1 zuwa wani taron, kuma ba za a iya haɗa shi ba.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-not: Shirin $1 ba shi da alaƙa da wannan taron, sabili da haka ba za a iya daidaita shi ba
campaignevents-registration-confirmation: Rijistar keɓaɓɓen: Sunan mai amfani a cikin jerin mahalarta kawai za a iya gani ga masu shirya taron da mambobi na mai amfani mai zuwa {{PLURAL:$2| rukuni|kungiyoyi}}: $1 . Masu shiryawa na iya ware gudummawar ku yayin taron akan [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] ko wasu kayan aikin tattara kididdiga.

Rijistar sirri: Sunan mai amfani da ku a cikin jerin masu halarta ne kawai masu shirya taron zasu iya gani. Masu shirya taron na iya cire gudummawarku a lokacin taron a kan [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] ko wasu kayan aiki don tattara kididdiga.

Rijistar jama'a: Nuna sunan mai amfani a jerin mahalarta jama'a. Masu shiryawa na iya haɗa gudummawar ku yayin taron akan [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] ko wasu kayan aikin tattara ƙididdiga.
echo-pref-tooltip-campaign-events-notifi: Ka sanar da ni lokacin da na yi rajista don wani taron da ke amfani da kayan aikin rajistar taron.
campaignevents-notification-registration: Ku shiga $1 don haɗi tare da wasu mahalarta kuma ku sami ƙarin sabuntawa daga masu shirya

campaignevents-event-details-email-messa: Abubuwan da ke cikin saƙon imel ɗin ku, wannan dole ne ya zama aƙalla haruffa 10
campaignevents-email-select-participant-: Da fatan za a zaɓi ingantattun masu karɓar imel
campaignevents-email-participants-missin: Wasu daga cikin mahalarta da aka zaɓa ba su da adireshin imel a asusun su kuma ba za su karɓi imel ɗin ku ba. Kuna iya aika musu da sako ta hanyar danna sunayensu na masu amfani da kuma zuwa shafin tattaunawar mai amfani.
campaignevents-email-footer: Wannan imel ɗin shine {{GENDER:$1|aika}} ta $1 zuwa {{GENDER:$2|$2}}, ɗan takara mai rijista na taron mai zuwa: $3. campaignevents-email-footer-collaboratio: Ziyarci lissafin Haɗin kai don nemo ƙarin al'amura da al'ummomi akan wikis: $1

Ban taba ba da gudummawa ga aikin Wikimedia a baya ba
Ina da ɗan gogewa, amma ba na jin kwarin gwiwa
Ina da ɗan gogewa, kuma ina jin ƙarfin bayar da gudunmawa, amma ina son ƙarin koyo

campaignevents-register-retention-base: Ana tattara martaninku sannan kuma an share kwanaki 90 bayan ƙaddamarwa ko kuma a ƙarshen taron, duk wanda ya zo na farko. Shirya martani kowane lokaci kafin lokacin. Da zarar an share su, ba za a iya canza su ba, ba za a sake amsa su, ko dawo da su ba.
campaignevents-register-retention-days: Sauran lokacin har sai an haɗa martanin ku kuma an goge shi shine: $1 {{PLURAL:$1| rana|kwana}} .
campaignevents-register-retention-hours: Sauran lokacin har sai an tattara martaninku kuma an goge shi shine: ƙasa da awanni 24 .
campaignevents-eventpage-register-dialog: Za a raba wannan bayanin tare da masu shirya taron kawai.
An tattara amsoshinku kuma an share su bisa ga bayanan riƙe bayanai.

Ana tattara martaninku sannan kuma an share kwanaki 90 bayan ƙaddamarwa ko kuma a ƙarshen taron, duk wanda ya zo na farko. Shirya martani kowane lokaci kafin lokacin. Da zarar an share su, ba za a iya canza su ba, ba za a sake amsa su, ko dawo da su ba.
Sauran lokacin har sai an haɗa martanin ku kuma an goge shi shine: $1 {{PLURAL:$1| rana|kwana}} .
Sauran lokacin har sai an haɗa martanin ku kuma an goge shi shine: kasa da awanni 24 .
campaignevents-details-stats-no-response: Wannan taron ba shi da martani daga mahalarta zuwa tara.
campaignevents-details-stats-not-ready: Za a tattara martanin mahalarta kuma a ba da su nan ba da jimawa ba.
campaignevents-details-stats-section-non: Tambayoyin da ba na sirri ba (wadanda ba PII ba)
campaignevents-details-stats-not-enough-: Wannan tambayar ta samu kasa da $1 jimillar {{PLURAL:$1| amsa|amsa}}.
campaignevents-event-dates-cannot-be-cha: Lamarin ya ƙare, don haka ba za ku iya canza ranakun taron zuwa kwanakin nan gaba ba. Wannan ƙuntatawa yana kare bayanan ɗan takara.

campaignevents-edit-field-clickwrap-chec: Wannan shafin ya ƙunshi jimillar martanin mahalarta ga tambayoyin fam ɗin rajista.
Don duba haɗakar martanin mahalarta waɗanda ke ɗauke da bayanan sirri, dole ne ku karɓi waɗannan abubuwa masu zuwa:
Na yarda da sarrafa bayanan ɗan takara, gami da bayanan da za a iya gane ɗan takara, wanda aka tattara yayin rajistar taron tare da kulawa.
campaignevents-participant-question-have: Wannan {{GENDER:$1| An tattara martanin mahalarta}} kuma an share su
campaignevents-warning-change-event-end-: Idan kun canza ranar ƙarshe zuwa ranar da ta gabata, za a rufe taron kuma za ku sami taƙaitaccen martani na mahalarta. Ba za a iya soke wannan aikin ba. Wannan yana aiki ne kawai idan mahalarta sun ba da amsoshi ga tambayoyin mahalarta.
campaignevents-event-details-participant: An share martanin mahalarta guda ɗaya kuma ana samun haɗaɗɗun martani a ƙarƙashin [ $1 {{int:campaignevents-event-details-tab-stats}}].
campaignevents-register-page-nonlocal: Da fatan za a kammala ''[ $1 ku kammala rajistar taron ku akan $2 ] ''', wiki inda aka ƙirƙiri taron.
campaignevents-delete-registration-page-: Da fatan za a share ''[ $1 share rajistar taron ku akan $2 ]''', wiki inda aka kirkiri taron.
campaignevents-event-details-page-nonloc: A halin yanzu kuna kallon taƙaitaccen sigar wannan shafin. Da fatan za a [ $1 ziyarci wannan shafi akan $2 ] , wiki inda aka ƙirƙiri taron, don samun damar cikakkun bayanan taron da ƙarin fasali.
campaignevents-event-details-sensitive-d: An toshe asusun ku. Ba ku da damar yin hakan.
campaignevents-generateinvitationlist-ar: Shigar da sunayen har zuwa $1 {{PLURAL:$1| labarin|lasidu}} da suka shafi batutuwan taron ku. Kowane labarin yakamata ya kasance akan sabon layi. Bayan haka, za a samar da jerin masu ba da gudummawa dangane da labaran da kuka ƙara.
campaignevents-invitation-list-disabled: Wannan wiki ba shi da kunna lissafin gayyata.
campaignevents-invitation-list-not-allow: Ba a ba ku izinin yin amfani da jerin gayyata ba.
campaignevents-myinvitationslist-empty-t: Gano sabbin mahalarta don aikin ko taron ku. Samar da jerin labaran da suka shafi batutuwan ayyukanku. Sannan, zaku karɓi jerin gayyata na editoci waɗanda ƙila suna sha'awar shiga aikinku ko taronku.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-emp: Bayar da sunan ga jerin gayyatar.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-inv: Shigar da shafin taron da ke amfani da Rijistar Aukuwa.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-eve: Wannan taron ya ƙare. Shigar da wani abu mai aiki.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-not: Shigar da shafin taron wanda ya jera ku azaman mai shiryawa.
campaignevents-worklist-error-empty: Shigar da aƙalla take labarin ɗaya.
campaignevents-worklist-error-too-large: Kun shigar da $1 {{PLURAL:$1| labari | labarai}}. Da fatan za a shigar da tsakanin 1 da $2 {{PLURAL:$2| labarai}}.
campaignevents-worklist-error-invalid-ti:
Mai zuwa {{PLURAL:$1| labarin yana da lakabi mara inganci | labarai suna da lakabi marasa inganci}}. Da fatan za a gyara {{PLURAL:$1| shi| taken}} kuma a sake gwadawa.
 $2
campaignevents-worklist-error-nonexisten:
Mai zuwa {{PLURAL:$1| labarin ya kasance|labudu}} ba a samo su ba. Da fatan za a tabbatar da {{PLURAL:$1| take| titles}} kuma a sake gwadawa.
 $2
campaignevents-worklist-error-titles-not:
Mai zuwa {{PLURAL:$1| labarin shine | labarai ba}} ba a cikin babban suna. Da fatan za a shigar da labarai a cikin babban filin suna kawai.
 $2
campaignevents-invitation-list-processin: Ana fitar da jerin editocin ku don gayyata. Sake sabunta shafin a cikin mintuna 5-10 don duba jerin gayyata.
campaignevents-invitation-list-invalid-i: Samar da ingantacciyar lissafin gayyata ID. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Duba jerin gayyata]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-does-not-: Babu wannan jerin gayyata. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Duba jerin gayyata]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-not-creat: Ba ku da izinin duba wannan jerin gayyata saboda ba ku ƙirƙira shi ba. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Duba jerin gayyata]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-nonlocal: Don Allah ''[ $1 duba wannan jerin gayyata akan $2 ]''', wiki inda aka samar.
campaignevents-invitation-list-intro: $1 {{PLURAL:$1|edita|editas}} aka samo, bisa ga waɗannan sharuɗɗa: bytes ɗin da suka ba da gudummawa ga labarin, adadin gyare-gyaren da suka yi a cikin labarin, gabaɗayan gyare-gyaren su yana dogara ne akan wikis, da kuma kwanan nan da suka gyara wikis.
campaignevents-invitationlist-no-editors: Babu editoci da suka cika [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CampaignEvents/Invitation_lists list sharudda] daga jerin labaran ku. Kuna iya [[Special:GenerateInvitationList|ƙirƙirar sabon jerin gayyata]] tare da sabon jerin labarai.
campaignevents-invitationlist-highly-rec: An ba da shawarar gayyata sosai
Waɗannan editocin sun sami babban matsayi na jerin gayyata, don haka suna da yuwuwar yin sha'awar shiga ayyukanku.
campaignevents-invitationlist-recommende: Waɗannan masu gyara sun sami matsakaicin matsakaicin jerin gayyata, amma har yanzu suna iya sha'awar shiga ayyukanku.
campaignevents-event-details-footer: Ziyarci [[Special:AllEvents|Jerin haɗin gwiwa]] don nemo ƙarin al'amura da al'ummomi akan wikis.
campaignevents-invitationlist-preference: Ka haɗa ni a cikin [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CampaignEvents/Invitation_lists gayyatar jerin].
campaignevents-eventpage-btn-collaborati: Neman ƙarin abubuwan da suka faru
campaignevents-eventslist-all-wikis: Wannan taron yana buɗewa ga duk wikis.
campaignevents-eventpage-all-wikis: Wannan taron yana buɗewa ga duk wikis.
campaignevents-allevents-label-upcoming-: Abubuwan da ke tafe: Abubuwan da ke farawa a cikin zaɓaɓɓun kwanakin
campaignevents-allevents-label-ongoing-e: Abubuwan da ke gudana: Abubuwan da suka fara kafin amma sun ci gaba a cikin kwanakin da aka zaɓa
